price: 61. Béni soit Celui Qui, dans le ciel, a mis de grands astres, y a placé un flambeau et une lune qui éclaire !
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī jaʿala fī al-samāi burūjan wajaʿala fīhā sirājan waqamaran munīran
